sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {useParams, useHistory, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import parse from 'html-react-parser' import postApi from '../../../../api/postApi' const Post = ({types, posts}) => { let {id} = useParams(); let history = useHistory(); const [post, setPost] = useState({}) const loadPost = async () => { const {data} = await postApi.get(id); setPost(data); } useEffect(() => { loadPost(); window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []); return (
Home / Blog / {post.name}

{post.name}

{post.date}

{post.description}



{post.content}

Categories

    {types.map(({ id, name }) => (
  • {name} ({posts.length})
    • ))}
) } Post.propTypes = { } export default Post
